title: Missing Files?
body:
ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000002.675|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml
000002.675|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000002.675|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml

+

ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "Global/Champions/champions.bin" because it's not in the manifest.


Anyone know why I am missing those files? I tried repairing it doesn't help, and reinstalling lol doesn't help either

replies.body: What error are you seeing that made you investigate into this log? I'll need a bit more info as to what's going on to know how to help you. ^.^
Never mind I fixed it I had to turn off the windows 10 game DVR thing on the Xbox app.

After the champion select, my game starts to load, then goes black and bugsplats. I tried everything riot recommends when  bugsplat happens and my specs are way more than enough. I have reinstalled lol completely about 3 times, and have tried to repair it multiple times.
